name: replicated-lib
description: Can interact with the vendor portal api!

scripts.create-object-store: rm -rf examples/*.js && tsc examples/create-object-store.ts && node examples/create-object-store.js
scripts.create-postgres: rm -rf examples/*.js && tsc examples/create-postgres.ts && node examples/create-postgres.js
scripts.expose-port: rm -rf examples/*.js && tsc examples/expose-port.ts && node examples/expose-port.js
scripts.poll-airgap: rm -rf examples/*.js && tsc examples/poll-for-airgap-build.ts && node examples/poll-for-airgap-build.js
scripts.test-list-customers: rm -rf examples/*.js && npm run build && tsc examples/test-list-customers-by-name.ts && node examples/test-list-customers-by-name.js
